com.eco.bio7.image

Class Individual

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eco.bio7.image.Individual

  • public class Individual
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some static methods for the creation of individual properties for the use in the Points panel of the Bio7 application.
    Author:
    Bio7
